Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) introduce a promising electrochemical conversion technology to generate elec-tricity directly from fuel oxidization.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: A three-dimensional (3D) numerical model is proposed to evaluate the SOFC performance by employing computational fluid dynamics (CFD) approach based on the finite element method.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: This research includes simultaneously solving momentum, energy, and mass transport equations linked with the electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: First, the modeling results of a SOFC system with a rectangular channel in the absence of obstacles are compared with the experimental data, showing very good agreement.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The effects of different shapes and numbers of obstacles on fuel cell behavior (voltage and power) are then evaluated to determine the optimal performance in the SOFC system.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The impacts of operating conditions such as inlet gas velocity in anode and cathode channels and porosity and permeability of electrodes on the SOFC electric output as well as integrated transport phenomena and electrochemical reactions are also investigated.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: It is concluded that the average current density (SOFC performance) increases by 15% upon using seven triangular obstacles in comparison with the reference case.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Fuel cell power is enhanced by almost 35%, compared to a cell with direct flow channels.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: It is found that the fuel cell performance is increased by using the trapezoidal and rectangular obstacles in the flow channels.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The amount of hydrogen consumption at the anode channel is an important parameter affecting the SOFC performance; by increasing the efficiency of the fuel cell, hydrogen conversion is increased.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: According to the results, the average overpotential in SOFC decreases with increasing fuel cell effi-ciency.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The new SOFC design proposed in this study can be used for optimal design and operation purposes.
Titulo: A numerical simulation to effectively assess impacts of flow channels characteristics on solid oxide fuel cell performance
